plot: A look into the work of one of the best filmmakers in the world, Eduardo Coutinho, until he makes one of his masterpiece: Cabra Marcado para Morrer.
title: Cabra Marcado para Viver
plot_es: A look into the work of one of the best filmmakers in the world, Eduardo Coutinho, until he makes one of his masterpiece: Cabra Marcado para Morrer.
plot_en: A look into the work of one of the best filmmakers in the world, Eduardo Coutinho, until he makes one of his masterpiece: Cabra Marcado para Morrer.
